title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: HS30097 and BM60011Course ContentsIntroduction to Derivatives; Determination of Forward and Futures Price; Hedging using Futures: Basic principles. Arguments for and against Hedging; Interest Rate Market: Types of Rates; Interest Rate Swap and its Valuation: the Comparative Advantage Arguments; Mechanics of Option Market; Introduction to Binomial Trees: One Step Binomial Model; Risk-Neutral Valuation; Two-Step Binomial Trees; Binomial Trees in Practice. Delta; Black-Scholes Model; Value at Risk (VAR): Historical Simulation, Model-Building Approach, Linear Model, Quadratic Model, Monet Carlo Simulation, Comparison of Approaches, Stress Testing and Back Testing, Principal Component Analysis.
